title: World Development Indicators - Observation Metadata
description: Footnotes and annotations for specific data points in the World Development Indicators, providing important context about individual observations such as data quality issues, estimation methods, or breaks in series.

columns.series_code: Unique World Bank identifier code for the indicator series
columns.year: Year of the observation that the metadata applies to
columns.description: Footnote or annotation text explaining data quality, estimation methods, or other important context for this specific observation
